com.mopub.common

Class Preconditions.NoThrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mopub.common.Preconditions.NoThrow
  • Enclosing class:
    Preconditions

    public static final class Preconditions.NoThrow
extends java.lang.Object
    Preconditions checks that avoid throwing and exception in release mode. These versions return a boolean which the caller should check.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      NoThrow()

    • Method Detail

      • setStrictMode

        public static void setStrictMode(boolean strictMode)
        Enables or disables strict mode. In strict mode, this class will throw anyway. For example, you could set strict mode to BuildConfig.DEBUG to always get exceptions when in the IDE.
        Parameters:
        strictMode - Whether to use strict mode.
